price: ߣߌߡߊ ߞߋ߬ߟߋ߲߬ߞߋ߬ߟߋ߲߬ߠߊ ߘߌ߫ ߛߊ߬ߦߊ ߡߊߜߊ߬ߙߏ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߕߘߋ߫ ، ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߞߐ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߛߊ߬ߦߌ߫ ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: kullu nafsin dhāiqatu al-mawti thumma ilaynā tur'jaʿūna
